titleStmt.title: The way to wealth wherein is plainly taught a most present remedy for sedicion. Wrytten and imprinted by Robert Crowley the .vii. of Februarye in the yere of our Lorde. a thousand fiue hu[n]derd [et] fiftie. In Elie rentes in Holburne cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
titleStmt.author: Crowley, Robert, 1518?-1588.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Mierdman for Robert Crowley,

notesStmt.note: The period after "fiftie" on the title page is actually three dots within round brackets.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
